name: LaserBelt
description:
Laserbreak is an endless runner, but on a treadmill. You run along the treadmill to escape the laser that is waiting for you. but you will have some problems, because you control a cube that is joined together by a chain with another cube . But don't loose him! You will need him to beat your previous highscores ;>.

"Joined Together" is also the theme of the first GMTK Game Jam I ever participated in and made this game for.

Controls: Space or Enter
